name: Contagious (ScriptLine Studios)
description:
A game made for the Pygame Community New Years Jam - Shoot bacteria, dodge bullets, and collect mutation cards in this top-down bullet hell. Game made by ScriptLine Studios#8597

Assets

The following assets were not made by me 

Explosions - https://untiedgames.itch.io/five-free-pixel-explosions

Music (Funny Bit and Boss Time) - https://www.fesliyanstudios.com/royalty-free-music/downloads-c/8-bit-music/6

Sound Effects - freesound.org

Code

All code for the project can either be downloaded from the source-code.zip.
